$zero: 0
$at: 0
$v0: 0
$a0: 3
$a1: 1
$a2: 2005
$t0: 3
$t1: 0
$t2: 0
$s0: 0
$s1: 0
$s2: 0
$k0: 0
$sp: 0
$fp: 0
$ra: 0
2000  00000000000000000000011111010000 |      .ORIG 2000
2001  00100011000000000000000000000001 |      ADDI $a0, $zero, 1
2002  00100100000000000000000000000001 |      ADDI $a1, $zero, 1
2003  00100110000000000000000000000011 |      ADDI $t0, $zero, 3
2004  00100101000000000000011111010101 |      ADDI $a2, $zero, 2005
2005  00000011001100000000000000000100 | LOOP ADD $a0, $a0, $a1, 
2006  01010011011000000000000000000010 |      BEQ $a0, $t0, DONE
2007  01100101000000000000000000000000 |      JALR $a2, $zero
2008  00000000000000000000000000000000 | DONE .END
